title: SheIn Introduces the Trench Coat as the Leading Product of the 2015 Fall & Winter Collection
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE SheIn Group Ltd.
NANJING , China , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Over-sized coat s and cozy sweaters play an indispensable role in fall and winter closet. If you are looking for a trench coat to wear when it's cold, then you are in the right place. Recently, SheIn introduced the trench coat as its main product of its 2015 Fall and Winter Outfit s .
SheIn Trench Coat: http://goo.gl/n91zkt
When it comes to trench coat s , what will firstly come into your mind? Just outerwear to keep coldness away? Or, something for looking much smarter during the winter? When we talk about the trench coat and trace its fashion history, two names would surely be mentioned : Thomas Burberry and Aquascutum. Thanks to these two companies which invented this garment, people have access to a practical clothing choice for transitional weather.
Although the trench coat has changed a lot as time goes by, it still maintains its historic roots. In the past, trench coat s were mainly worn by males. This is a kind of ideal daily wear for men in ha r sh weather conditions. The clean and smart look of trench coats is appealing to more and more business women. Sometimes, ladies have their unique understanding of how to wear and match a trench coat .
Nowadays, the trench coat frequently appear s on catwalks and High Street Fashion. Compared with other coats, trench coats are much softer and are pretty cozy and comfortable all day long. Grey, khaki, black and any other neutral color s are the usual color s of trench coat s because they can make you look slimmer and smarter. Also they are versatile enough so that you don't have to wash it frequently.
If you are puzzled by fall and winter daily wear , perhaps trench coat s are a practical option. SheIn has a wide range of trench coat s for your selection and provides heavy discounts as well. Free gifts will be given to order s over $49 for the top 1000 orders everyday. Besides, if you are a new customer, you will get 35% off of your first order at www.shein.com . And now, it's the perfect time to complete your fall and winter outfit with SheIn's functional over-sized trench coat.
ABOUT SHEIN
SheIn is an online store boasting high quality clothes and other fashionable accessories. Our objective is to be the largest online wardrobe company in the world. We aim to offer our customers a variety of the latest and most fashionable clothing.
For more information please visit: http://goo.gl/xG0rn0
